name: Youtube Subscribe Link Locker
author: Jasminder Pal Singh (Z-G)

sections.description:
By using this link locker you can convert each visitor into a subscriber of your youtube channel. You can lock any type of links like download links etc. . It will secure the links until the user subscribes to your youtube channel . You can get huge amount of subscribers depending upon the traffic on your website or videos.
How it works ? Suppose you have something to share with the world like ebooks, graphics, your own music or any other kind of downloadable stuff etc. Sure go ahead , share with the internet but Why not to make them your youtube channel subscribers ? . In this way people will get the content and you will get huge list of subscribers for your youtube channel. What you need to do is simply secure the original link you wants to share with the people with this locker and let it do its job. Each of the visitor to your content will be your youtube subscribers. The visitor will need to subscribe first, then only the content will show up.

Features:

Convert each visitor into channel subscriber.
Get hundreds of subscribers.
Fully featured userpanel.
Customize,Delete,Add links easily.
Uses official Youtube API.
Check stats about subscriptions easily.
Easy to implement on your website.
Compatible with all major browsers.
Lock any type of links.
No coding skills required to use.
Best for download links.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/yt-subscribe-link-locker directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Check more instructions about how to use this plugins under plugin options page Settings > Youtube Subscribe Link Locker
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/yt-subscribe-link-locker directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Check more instructions about how to use this plugins under plugin options page Settings > Youtube Subscribe Link Locker
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)

Is it free to use ?

Trial version is free to try . Signup for a trial account here http://wp.subscribetodownload.net/trial.php. After trial you can go for premium (if you like).

Does this plugin use external 3rd Party service/website ?

Yes, it use official youtube link locker website http://subscribetodownload.net to navigate to locked links .
